name: UIApplication.LaunchOptionsKey
desc: The keys you use to access values in the launch options dictionary that the system passes to your app at initialization.

items.name: static let annotation: UIApplication.LaunchOptionsKey
items.desc: A key indicating that the URL passed to your app contained custom annotation data from the source app.

items.name: static let bluetoothCentrals: UIApplication.LaunchOptionsKey
items.desc: A key indicating that the app was relaunched to handle Bluetooth-related events.

items.name: static let bluetoothPeripherals: UIApplication.LaunchOptionsKey
items.desc: A key indicating that the app should continue actions associated with its Bluetooth peripheral objects.

items.name: static let cloudKitShareMetadata: UIApplication.LaunchOptionsKey
items.desc: A key indicating that the app received a CloudKit share invitation.

items.name: static let location: UIApplication.LaunchOptionsKey
items.desc: A key indicating that the app was launched to handle an incoming location event.

items.name: static let newsstandDownloads: UIApplication.LaunchOptionsKey
items.desc: A key indicating that the app was launched to process newly downloaded Newsstand assets.

items.name: static let remoteNotification: UIApplication.LaunchOptionsKey
items.desc: A key indicating that a remote notification is available for the app to process.

items.name: static let shortcutItem: UIApplication.LaunchOptionsKey
items.desc: A key indicating that the app was launched in response to the user selecting a Home screen quick action.

items.name: static let sourceApplication: UIApplication.LaunchOptionsKey
items.desc: A key indicating that another app requested the launch of your app.

items.name: static let url: UIApplication.LaunchOptionsKey
items.desc: A key indicating that the app was launched so that it could open the specified URL.

items.name: static let userActivityDictionary: UIApplication.LaunchOptionsKey
items.desc: A key indicating a dictionary associated with an activity that the user wants to continue.

items.name: static let userActivityType: UIApplication.LaunchOptionsKey
items.desc: A key indicating the type of user activity that the user wants to continue.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a launch options key with the specified raw value.
